Enjoy a rotating selection of hand-picked wines paired with chef-crafted small plates designed for sharing, lingering, and connecting. Whether you’re stopping in for happy hour or settling in for an unhurried evening with friends, Charlotte’s offers a warm, inviting space to sip, savor, and stay awhile. Welcome to Charlotte’s Wine Bar & Tapas — a Mount Pleasant retreat where every pour and plate is meant to be savored at a Southern pace. Charlotte's Wine Bar and Tapas 320 W.
